sourcesContent: import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent { title = 'codigoAngular'; public switcher = 0; public log = ['out','in']; public logIn() : void { this.switcher = 1; console.log(this.log[this.switcher]) } ngOnInit(){ console.log(this.log[this.switcher]) } }
